cast.overview: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.
cast.title: Blue Velvet

cast.overview: Charlie Simms is a student at a private preparatory school who comes from a poor family. To earn the money for his flight home to Gresham, Oregon for Christmas, Charlie takes a job over Thanksgiving looking after retired U.S. Army officer Lieutenant Colonel Frank Slade, a cantankerous middle-aged man who lives with his niece and her family.
cast.title: Scent of a Woman

details.biography: Peter Carew was born on November 8, 1922 in Old Forge, Pennsylvania, USA. He was an actor, known for Blue Velvet (1986), Scent of a Woman (1992) and Someone to Watch Over Me (1987). He died on August 9, 1995 in Paramus, New Jersey, USA.
details.name: Peter Carew
